item.title: Cats!
item.description: /c/Cats! on u.fail https://u.fail/c/cats Description ### **The CAT** Share. The. Cat! **Basic community rules:** - No spreading of fake news or misinformation. - Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting. - No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism. - No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies. - No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users. - No illegal content. Details * Subscribers 46 Posts 14 Comments 17 Daily Active Users 13 Weekly Active Users 17 Monthly Active Users 17 Published 2023-06-14 16:26:35 Updated 2023-06-15 22:25:29 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:27

item.title: Lemmy
item.description: /c/Lemmy on u.fail https://u.fail/c/lemmy Description ### **Welcome to uFail** We are a friendly community that runs on free open source software. **Basic community rules:** - No spreading of fake news or misinformation. - Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting. - No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism. - No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies. - No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.

item.title: uFail
item.description: /c/uFail on u.fail https://u.fail/c/ufail Description ## uFail Community Welcome to the uFail default community. Please ask your questions here. **Basic community rules:** - No spreading of fake news or misinformation. - Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting. - No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism. - No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies. - No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users.
